title.rendered: Agency Operations: Work Less + Earn More with Karl Sakas – 15-minute Session + Q&A

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597242060346{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Agency Operations: Work Less + Earn More with Karl Sakas

[vc_text_separator title=”15-minute Session + Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1598298976589{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843303664{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Clients call Karl Sakas their “agency therapist.” With an extensive background in agency operations and digital marketing, Karl helps agency leaders through consulting, coaching, and training. During a 15-minute session, Karl shares his expertise about how agencies can work less while earning more and then he joins SharpSpring CMO Chip House for a live Q&A about agency operations.

Check out other free sessions like this one via our Agency Growth Series with other top influencers in digital marketing like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Rand Fishkin, Shama Hyder and many more![/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Karl Sakas

Agency Consultant, Sakas & Company

Agency growth is good… until it gets out of control. Karl Sakas helps agency leaders “calm the chaos” of running their business—through consulting, coaching, and training. Clients benefit from Karl’s agency operations background and experience in digital marketing since the days of dialup. His clients call him their “agency therapist.” When he’s not advising agencies worldwide, Karl volunteers as a bartender on an antique train.read more...

Chip House

CMO, SharpSpring

Chip House is CMO at SharpSpring. A well-known executive in the email marketing industry, Chip has extensive experience with organizational development and go-to-market strategies in early- to mid-stage B2B SaaS companies. At SharpSpring, Chip drives strategy for the marketing team, leading content, lead generation, marketing operations and more.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1597245028583{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-35-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
